headline: Elon Musk's xAI faces tougher road building out data centers after EPA rule update
summary: An updated rule from the EPA closed a loophole that allowed xAI to build its Memphis data center quickly using air-polluting turbines as a power source.

headline: Ciena Stock Gains 43% in 3 Months: Should Investors Buy or Hold Now?
summary: CIEN shares are up 42.6% in three months as AI-driven bandwidth demand, a $5B backlog and a raised 2026 outlook fuel the rally despite a premium valuation.

headline: DELL vs. CSCO: Which AI Infrastructure Stock Is the Better Buy Now?
summary: Dell Technologies leads in AI server demand, but Cisco Systems' networking strength and earnings momentum position it as the stronger AI infrastructure stock.

headline: MRVL's Data Center Switching Business Expands: New Growth Engine?
summary: Marvell Technology's data center switching is accelerating, with revenues set to surpass $300 million in fiscal 2026 and $500 million in 2027 as next-gen platforms ramp.
